title: smau36
author: smau36
content: Warning! Error encountered during contract execution [execution reverted] how should my funds of this address be recovered???Â Warning! Error encountered during contract execution [execution reverted]

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: What is the problem? You need to explain better. You have a coin on a wallet and not able to spend it or what? Or you paid into an exchange account and you are unable to trade? Which wallet or exchange did you use?

comments.author: Maus0728
comments.body: There are few posts in reddit that have the same issue as yours.Quote from: https://www.reddit.com/r/UniSwap/comments/m8ibk7/warning_error_encountered_during_contract/So generally execution reverted means the transaction was canceled due to slippage. Every transaction has a slippage % and if that % is exceeded the transaction is reverted. Yes you paid the gas fee for it, because the miner did "work" but had to reverse the outcome.Quote from: https://ethereum.stackexchange.com/questions/87475/how-to-fix-warning-error-encountered-during-contract-execution-out-of-gasYour gas limit is too low. Retry the transaction with a gas limit of 6 million. The transaction will only use the required gas without consuming it allIn other words, the issue could perhaps be related to gas limit, slippage or simply low gas fees.Quote from: smau36 on February 01, 2023, 12:23:08 AMhow should my funds of this address be recovered???As far as I know, your gas fees won't be refunded, but the money that was sent unsuccessfully will.

comments.author: smau36
